risk_description: Mobile background location tracking reliability issues on iOS/Android due to OS-level battery optimizations and aggressive background process killing, potentially violating the <2s latency requirement for 'Travel Mode'.
root_cause: Native mobile OS restrictions on background execution and GPS usage to conserve battery.
mitigation_strategy: Implement 'react-native-background-geolocation' with battery-conscious configuration; Implement heartbeat mechanism to detect silent failures; Use motion-detection to adjust update frequency dynamically.
contingency_plan: Fallback to polling mechanism or push notifications to wake app; Relax latency requirement to <5s for background state.
monitoring_trigger: Technician location updates stop receiving while job status is 'Travel Mode' for > 60 seconds.

risk_description: Offline data synchronization conflicts causing data loss or corruption when technicians submit service reports (WI-MOB-002) after prolonged offline periods.
root_cause: Complexity of multi-master data replication and conflict resolution logic in 'Offline-First' architecture.
mitigation_strategy: Implement strict 'Server Wins' or 'Last Write Wins' conflict resolution policy; Design idempotent backend APIs; Use WatermelonDB for local persistence with atomic sync protocol.
contingency_plan: Implement a manual 'Conflict Resolution' UI for technicians to review and re-submit failed sync items.
monitoring_trigger: Sync queue length > 0 for > 2 hours on active devices; Client-side error logs reporting sync failures.

risk_description: Azure AD B2C integration complexity and policy configuration delays impacting the authentication timeline and RBAC implementation.
root_cause: Steep learning curve of Azure AD B2C Custom Policies and Identity Experience Framework.
mitigation_strategy: Allocate senior resource specifically for IAM; Utilize standard User Flows where possible before custom policies; Create early POC for token claims mapping.
contingency_plan: Temporarily use standard OAuth2 provider (Auth0) for dev/test environments to unblock frontend development.
monitoring_trigger: Authentication tickets remaining in 'Blocked' status for > 3 days; Login latency > 500ms.

risk_description: PostGIS spatial query performance degradation under high load (10k users) impacting the automated service routing logic latency (<250ms).
root_cause: Complex 'ST_Contains' polygon queries on unoptimized indexes or insufficient database compute resources.
mitigation_strategy: Implement proper GIST spatial indexes; Cache service area polygon definitions in Redis; Use read replicas for routing queries.
contingency_plan: Simplify polygon geometries (reduce vertices); Scale up PostgreSQL SKU; Fallback to postal-code based routing.
monitoring_trigger: Database CPU > 70%; Routing API endpoint latency > 200ms (P95).

risk_description: Automated rollback procedure (WI-CICD-002) failing for stateful services involving database schema changes, leading to prolonged downtime.
root_cause: Incompatibility between previous application versions and new database schema structures (destructive migrations).
mitigation_strategy: Enforce 'Expand and Contract' database migration pattern (non-destructive changes only); Test rollbacks in Staging pipeline.
contingency_plan: Manual database restore from point-in-time snapshot (RTO < 4 hours); Execute manual SQL rollback scripts.
monitoring_trigger: Deployment health check failure rate > 1%; Schema migration errors in CI/CD logs.

risk_description: Apple App Store rejection due to 'Background Location' permission usage without sufficient justification or battery optimization.
root_cause: Strict App Store review guidelines regarding user privacy and battery usage for background processes.
mitigation_strategy: Implement 'When In Use' permission first; Provide clear UI explanation/video for 'Always' permission; Ensure 'Travel Mode' has explicit start/stop.
contingency_plan: Remove background requirement and force foreground usage for tracking; Submit appeal with business case documentation.
monitoring_trigger: App Store Review status 'Rejected' or 'Metadata Rejected'.

risk_description: WCAG 2.1 Level AA non-compliance in Web Portals due to reliance on third-party UI component libraries lacking full accessibility support.
root_cause: Selection of UI components (Shadcn/MUI) without rigorous accessibility audit or improper implementation.
mitigation_strategy: Integrate 'axe-core' into CI/CD pipeline; Conduct manual keyboard navigation testing; Use Headless UI components for maximum control.
contingency_plan: Refactor non-compliant components; Engage external accessibility audit firm.

risk_description: WebSocket connection scalability issues (WI-BACK-005) causing dropped messages or latency during high concurrency (10,000 users).
root_cause: Stateful nature of WebSockets making horizontal scaling complex; Redis adapter bottlenecks.
mitigation_strategy: Use Redis Adapter for Socket.io distribution; Configure Azure SignalR Service as alternative; Load test with 20k concurrent connections.
contingency_plan: Migrate to Azure SignalR Service (fully managed) to offload connection management.
monitoring_trigger: WebSocket connection errors > 1%; Message delivery latency > 200ms.
